description.en-US:
Learn anything and boost your grades with Cabra, the award-winning flashcard and studying tool! A must-have for any student!
Learn anything, anywhere with Cabra, the world's most powerful and intuitive flashcard app. Turbo charge your studying, revolutionize the way you learn, and make your grades skyrocket.

Stop messing around with paper flashcards! Use Cabra to create flashcards with one tap - or import over 20,000,000 flashcard sets from Quizlet. Study on the go and make the most of your time: Cabra identifies your weaknesses and makes you study cards you don't know more often. Use Cabra on all your devices - phone, tablet, computer - and sync your flashcards in the cloud so you never miss a beat.

Install Cabra now to kickstart your education and jump to the front of the class.

Features:
☛ Completely free (seriously!)
☛ Fast, beautiful, and intuitive interface
☛ Add images to your flashcards
☛ Batch Flashcard Creator: create hundreds of cards at once
☛ Import over 20,000,000 sets from Quizlet
☛ Sync your progress in the cloud - no registration needed
☛ Study offline or online
☛ Supports any language 
☛ Study front-to-back or back-to-front
☛ Works on Android phones & tablets, computers, and the web
☛ Lots of customization

Cabra is great for:
✔ Studying for math, science, language, history, or anything else
✔ Preparing and practicing for tests
✔ Languages: learn Spanish, French, Chinese, Arabic, and more!
✔ High school and college courses, including APs
✔ Training for SAT, ACT and other major exams
✔ Test, quiz, and homework help
✔ Memorizing things in a flash

Love from reviewers:
♥ CNET: "Who says flashcards have to be boring? We like this modern update to a schoolroom staple."
♥ Softonic: "Cabra is a useful learning tool for multiple choice exams."
♥ Soft-Go: "Cabra packs a lot of power, but has a clean, intuitive interface and is very easy to use."

And users like you:
♥ Kevin: "Great study tool. This is a really nice app on both Chrome and Android. Works flawlessly at what it does, very nice clean interface. I love the mass card creator. Oh, and the fact that both Chrome and Android versions have the same features and layout is awesome."
♥ Megan: "This app was exactly what I needed. Allows me to quiz myself on my cards, keeping track of which ones I don't know. I then am given the option to study just the cards I don't know. For me this is perfection."
♥ Nicky: "Love it! Helped me so much with my exams, and lets you look at the ones you don't know. Really useful!"
♥ Tilia: "I have tried several flashcard apps and had assumed I was relegated to the old fashioned paper kind before I discovered Cabra... Thank you!"
♥ Ken, teacher: "It's a wonderful program and I highly recommend it to my students."

More goodies:
☺ Works on any device - from phones to tablets to computers
☺ Supports all scripts - Chinese (simplified and traditional, Mandarin and Cantonese), Japanese (hiragana and katakana), Arabic, Hindi, and more
☺ Access from anywhere
☺ Always free and open-source
☺ Won 1st place in PA Computer Fair - three times
